name: Cooperation Corporation
description:
Cooperation Corporation is a end-of-study project made by 4 students at EPITA:

  • Robin Cassan
  • Léo Ercolanelli
  • Guillaume Roffé
  • Maxence de Bergeyck

The project was under the supervision of Florent D'Halluin (Google).

As part of a study of Life Simulation, a State of the Art document was made, as well as a few demos. This final demo aims at showing how artificially intelligent agents can cooperate in order to run a factory and build as many objects as possible, in an optimal way.
The problem is divided in tasks (transportation tasks and building tasks) that are assigned to the workers according to their characteristics. The assignment is done with a modified Munkres Algorithm.
This game was made with Unity3D and uses free models from turbosquid.com and a logo made by Hitchcock Creative. The icons were found on game-icons.net

See https://bitbucket.org/fdhalluin/epita_pfee_2015_lifesimulation for the source code (requires Unity 5).
